attributes.action: Close all Supermarkets and Stores on Sunday's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Govenment is concerned about motorist causing  pollution, they cannot have failed to notice the absence of cars on the road on Easter Suday. Surely we do not need shops and stores open 7 day's a week

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
